definitions.title: vb. denom.
definitions.body: tent, move tent fr. place to place (cf. As. â’ilu (?) Dl:W No. 4 & Agl) [[וַיֶּאֱהַל]] Ge 13:12, Ge 13:18 (J), cf. [[ישֵׁב אׂהֶל]] (v. [[אׂהֶל]]);

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יַהֵל]] (contr. for [[יְאַהֵל]]) pitch one's tent like nomad Is 13:20.
